title: Music Fetch Database
description: fetching acnh songs from external sites

_pre.description: Prefix for most if not all soundtrack urls that are fetched.

hr_sunny.description: Soundtracks for acnh hourly songs (sunny weather). On the website these are played during Summer (Southern Hemisphere).

hr_snowy.description: Soundtracks for acnh hourly songs (snowy weather). On the website these are played during Winter (Southern Hemisphere).
